obv_fab_deploy.semantic_model
=============================

.. py:module:: obv_fab_deploy.semantic_model


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   obv_fab_deploy.semantic_model.deploy_semantic_model


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: deploy_semantic_model(source_workspace_name, source_semantic_model_name, target_workspace_name, target_semantic_model_name, target_lakehouse_name)

   Deploys a semantic model from source workspace to target workspace,
   and rebinds it to the specified target lakehouse.
